description: Try our easy to follow Baked Fish With Miso Glaze recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fish dishes,Broccolini,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Roast,Low salt,Wheat free,Low sugar,Salmon
name: Baked Fish With Miso Glaze Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 long red chilli, deseeded, thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine miso, 1 tbs honey, vinegar, garlic and ginger in a jug. Place salmon into a shallow dish. Pour over 2/3 of the miso mixture, reserving remainder, and turn fish to coat. Marinate skin-side up for 15 minutes.
Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a baking pan with baking paper. Toss broccolini in a bowl with 1 tsp sesame oil and set aside.
Transfer salmon to pan, skin-side down. Spoon over any remaining marinade. Add broccolini to pan along with salmon and cook for 7 minutes or until salmon is cooked to your liking.
Meanwhile, combine carrot, spring onion, chilli and coriander leaves in a bowl. Add remaining sesame oil and toss to coat.
Stir remaining honey into reserved miso mixture. Spread over salmon. Serve with carrot salad and roasted broccolini.
